void debug(int **ar, int n, int m)
{
    int i, j;
    rep(i,0,n) {
        rep(j, 0, m) {
            cout << ar[i][j] << " ";
        }
        nl;
    }
}
ll dp[21];

ll f(int n)
{
    if(dp[n] != -1) {
        return dp[n];
    }
    dp[n] = (n - 1)*(f(n - 1) + f(n - 2));
    return dp[n];
}

int main()
{
    int t;
    sci(t);
    mem(dp, -1);
    dp[0] = dp[1] = 0;
    dp[2] = 1;
    while(t--) {
        int n;
        sci(n);
        prl(f(n)); nl;
    }
    return 0;
}
